content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite
inventory=[{"type": "crying_obsidian", "quantity": 40, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 49, "index": 19}, {"type": "fishing_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_concrete", "quantity": 5, "index": 23}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 26}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "repeater", "quantity": 29, "index": 38}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 60, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft an andesite, I need to move the cobblestone from slot 18 to the crafting grid. I will start by moving it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crying_obsidian", "quantity": 40, "index": 17}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 49, "index": 19}, {"type": "fishing_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_concrete", "quantity": 5, "index": 23}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 26}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "repeater", "quantity": 29, "index": 38}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 60, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the cobblestone is in the crafting grid, I need to move the diorite from slot 31 to the crafting grid. I will move it to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
act: move from slot 31 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crying_obsidian", "quantity": 40, "index": 17}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 49, "index": 19}, {"type": "fishing_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_concrete", "quantity": 5, "index": 23}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "repeater", "quantity": 29, "index": 38}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 60, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the cobblestone and diorite are in the crafting grid, I can craft the andesite by moving it from slot 0 to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2
